item.title: Podcasts of Symposium on Methodologies for the History of Computing in the Humanities, c.1949-1980 now available!
item.description: University College London, 17 September 2011 (Sponsored by HKFZ and UCLDH)

item.title: Welcome to Hidden Histories
item.description: Hidden Histories is a research project into the application of computational methods to the humanities during the period from 1949 to the present. The project conducts, collects and disseminates interviews with scholars and practitioners who were active during this period. Combining the interviews with archival data, new insight is gained into the emergence of a field known today as digital humanities.
